about_the_game:
Story and Atmosphere

Sqube: The Beginning takes you on an intriguing journey through a mysterious and dark world. As you start this adventure, unaware of who you are or where you come from, the world around you grows more complex with each step. As you progress, you will uncover secrets about both this strange world and yourself. Along the way, your clone will be your greatest ally, but it won't always be clear who you can trust. The mystery deepens as you move forward.

Gameplay

Sqube combines clever puzzle-solving with intense action. You will need to work strategically with your clone to overcome obstacles, solve intricate puzzles, and make progress. Your clone will help you reach hard-to-access areas and outsmart dangerous situations. But it’s not all about puzzles—along the way, you'll encounter enemies that you'll need to defeat using your single weapon. The game offers the thrill of action with satisfying shooting moments, blending strategy and reflexes to create a unique experience.

Design

Sqube features a minimalist and immersive design that pulls you into a world filled with mystery and discovery. The game's dark and atmospheric aesthetic encourages exploration, with each level offering new challenges and secrets to uncover. Every structure you encounter hints at the depth of the story, drawing you deeper into the world.

Controls

Sqube offers simple yet precise controls using mouse and keyboard, allowing you to smoothly navigate your character and clone. You’ll need sharp timing and careful planning to solve puzzles and defeat enemies. While the controls are easy to grasp, they allow for strategic depth, ensuring that both your intellect and reflexes are tested throughout the game.

  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz (Apple M1, Intel Core i5)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • Processor: Quad core CPU 2.4 GHz (Apple M1 or Intel Core i5)
